BFS - Class in upei.project
Searches to check if there is a valid path to a winning state for the current player
BFS(Board, Fence) - Constructor for class upei.project.BFS
Constructor checks for a valid path for the current player, switches player and then checks for currentOpp.
BFSNode - Class in upei.project
This node is used to implement the breadth first search algorithm Each node has a parent node, a state represented as player coordinates, and x, y coordinates.
BFSNode(BFSNode, int[]) - Constructor for class upei.project.BFSNode
Constructs a new BFSNode with the specified parent and state
BFSStrategy - Class in upei.project
Strategy algorithim for the game Quoridor
BFSStrategy(Board, int) - Constructor for class upei.project.BFSStrategy
